name: Save Ocean
description:
Our Game Theme : Oceans are key to survival but its been polluted alot. We need to repair it to Save Our Future.

We have created this Game in less then 72 hours by learning Unigine Engine from scratch (it took us around 50 hours in that just to learn about the engine). The concept of the game is Ocean Clean Up. We need to collect the garbage floating in ocean.

The Game runs for 2 minutes use Left and Right arrows to turn the boat. collect as much u can and repair the future.
